properties.entry: SELECT A.BOARD_CODE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_DATE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , B.USER_NAME FROM USER_BOARD A JOIN USER_TABLE B ON(A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) WHERE A.BOARD_CODE = ?

SELECT
C.USER_NAME , B.REPLY_CONTENT , B.REPLY_DATE , B.REPLY_CODE FROM USER_TOTAL_REPLY_BOARD A JOIN USER_REPLY B ON (A.REPLY_CODE = B.REPLY_CODE) JOIN ( SELECT * FROM USER_BOARD R JOIN USER_TABLE E ON (R.USER_CODE = E.USER_CODE) ) C ON (C.BOARD_CODE = A.BOARD_CODE) WHERE A.BOARD_CODE = ?

SELECT C.USER_NAME , C.REPLY_CONTENT , C.REPLY_DATE , C.REPLY_CODE FROM STORE_REPLY_BOARD A JOIN OWNER_INQUIRY B ON (A.BOARD_CODE = B.BOARD_CODE) JOIN( SELECT * FROM OWNER_REPLY_MANAGE R JOIN USER_TABLE E ON (R.USER_CODE = E.USER_CODE) ) C ON (C.REPLY_CODE = A.REPLY_CODE) WHERE A.BOARD_CODE = ?
